context: Do you have to be online to play this game? I don't have internet connection for my PS3, and I want to make sure I don't need it before I buy this.
response: You don't have to be connected to the Internet at all!  My son has been playing this game for over a year and loves it!

context: Does this work with chromecast? Does it have auto switch?
response: I don't know about chromecast. It doesn't switch by auto or manually, it plays what's on, either one or both simultaneously. It's more a splitter than a switch. It always sends the signal to all that are on.

context: Can this work on the ipad?
response: Not for usb. Bluetooth support for external controllers are only available on a jailbroken device. Haven`t seen anything for USB.

context: is it possible to hold a 3DS XL that's being enclosed in the duraflexi protector?
response: why yes, yes it is. this is the one I've got, ordered it together with the hard pouch HORI Nintendo 3DS XL Retro Mario Duraflexi Protectorthe duraflexi does add some slight bulk to the system but nothing in the way of any real weight.I highly recommend both products.

context: Does this come with the leather carrying case? (I used to own a pair of these and the case was very nice.)
response: Yes they do come with leather cases

context: will this drive play gamecube games?
response: Yes, it will play gamecube games. It will play anything the original drive would.

context: how can i access the game after buying the code
response: You should STEAM application to activiate code then play the game.

context: Will this work with Google Earth flight simulator?
response: Sure, if you have the gear to go with the stick..

context: brings charger and cable? you have the box? Greetings
response: Yes, it comes with the charger. it also contains manuals. basically the psp is like new.

context: Will it play on Wii U?
response: Yes. WiiU has backward compatibility so that you can play your old Wii games. Just have your remote, speakers up, and let the scary fun times begin lol

context: Are the Zumba games with the Zumba belt compatible with this console?
response: Yes they are.The belt allows you to be hands free.Hope this helps!
If you are referring to Fifa the soccer game, then no, a fight stick will not work properly.

context: can you play ps vita games on it????
response: No just your standard psp games but this is just a straight download device so you have to download your games or cinvert your games to computer and then to the go.My opinion of this psp is its not bad its nice to not carry all those games.but it sucks downloading games cause it takes to long.hopes this helps

context: I wanted to know in which language this game . Thank you

response: Yes.  This is a single player game, where you can control the individuals in your party.

context: Considering the steam version of this game has a Mac option, does this code work for downloading the Mac version or is it only for PC?
response: I think that you have to look for the Mac version in the games. Some are Mac and PC compatible.

context: Can I play Civ without the disc once I loaded the game on the computer.
response: No, you need disk 1.  I currently have a downloaded copy but had the multiple disk set.

context: Is this game compatible with WIndows 7?
response: It does work on Windows 7; however, i would highly recommend patching/modding it so that it runs smoother. Due to its age, the game suffers from frequent crashes that may hinder gameplay if you don't save frequently (every 5 minutes).

context: Does this remove HDCP? I'm trying to record gamplay footage with the elgato but HDCP is preventing that.
response: No it does not. I just recieved mine today and does not strip HDCP. Total loss today...the war is not lost though!
